verses.verse: What <WG5101> shall we say <WG2046> then? <WG3767> Shall we continue <WG1961> in sin, <WG266> that <WG2443> grace <WG5485> may abound? <WG4121>
God forbid. <WG1096> <WG3361> How <WG4459> shall we, that <WG3748> are dead <WG599> to sin, <WG266> live <WG2198> any longer <WG2089> therein? <WG1722> <WG846>
<WG2228> Know ye not, <WG50> that <WG3754> so many of us as <WG3745> were baptized <WG907> into <WG1519> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> were baptized <WG907> into <WG1519> his <WG848> death? <WG2288>

Therefore <WG3767> we are buried <WG4916> with him <WG846> by <WG1223> baptism <WG908> into <WG1519> death: <WG2288> that <WG2443> like as <WG5618> Christ <WG5547> was raised up <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> by <WG1223> the <WG3588> glory <WG1391> of the <WG3588> Father, <WG3962> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> we <WG2249> also <WG2532> should walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> newness <WG2538> of life. <WG2222>

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> we have been <WG1096> planted together <WG4854> in the <WG3588> likeness <WG3667> of his <WG848> death, <WG2288> we shall be <WG2071> <WG235> also <WG2532> in the likeness of his resurrection: <WG386>

Knowing <WG1097> this, <WG5124> that <WG3754> our <WG2257> old <WG3820> man <WG444> is crucified with <WG4957> him, that <WG2443> the <WG3588> body <WG4983> of sin <WG266> might be destroyed, <WG2673> that henceforth <WG3371> we <WG2248> should not serve <WG1398> sin. <WG266>
For <WG1063> he that is dead <WG599> is freed <WG1344> from <WG575> sin. <WG266>
Now <WG1161> if <WG1487> we be dead <WG599> with <WG4862> Christ, <WG5547> we believe <WG4100> that <WG3754> we shall also <WG2532> live with <WG4800> him: <WG846>

Knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> Christ <WG5547> being raised <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> dieth <WG599> no more; <WG3765> death <WG2288> hath no more dominion over <WG2961> <WG3765> him. <WG846>
For <WG1063> in that <WG3739> he died, <WG599> he died <WG599> unto sin <WG266> once: <WG2178> but <WG1161> in that <WG3739> he liveth, <WG2198> he liveth <WG2198> unto God. <WG2316>

Likewise <WG3779> reckon <WG3049> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> yourselves <WG1438> to be <WG1511> dead <WG3498> indeed <WG3303> unto sin, <WG266> but <WG1161> alive <WG2198> unto God <WG2316> through <WG1722> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our <WG2257> Lord. <WG2962>

Let not <WG3361> sin <WG266> therefore <WG3767> reign <WG936> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> mortal <WG2349> body, <WG4983> that ye should obey <WG5219> it <WG846> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> lusts <WG1939> thereof. <WG848>

Neither <WG3366> yield <WG3936> ye your <WG5216> members <WG3196> as instruments <WG3696> of unrighteousness <WG93> unto sin: <WG266> but <WG235> yield <WG3936> yourselves <WG1438> unto God, <WG2316> as <WG5613> those that are alive <WG2198> from <WG1537> the dead, <WG3498> and <WG2532> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> as instruments <WG3696> of righteousness <WG1343> unto God. <WG2316>

For <WG1063> sin <WG266> shall not <WG3756> have dominion over <WG2961> you: <WG5216> for <WG1063> ye are <WG2075> not <WG3756> under <WG5259> the law, <WG3551> but <WG235> under <WG5259> grace. <WG5485>

What <WG5101> then? <WG3767> shall we sin, <WG264> because <WG3754> we are <WG2070> not <WG3756> under <WG5259> the law, <WG3551> but <WG235> under <WG5259> grace? <WG5485> God forbid. <WG1096> <WG3361>

Know <WG1492> ye not, <WG3756> that <WG3754> to whom <WG3739> ye yield <WG3936> yourselves <WG1438> servants <WG1401> to <WG1519> obey, <WG5218> his servants <WG1401> ye are <WG2075> to whom <WG3739> ye obey; <WG5219> whether <WG2273> of sin <WG266> unto <WG1519> death, <WG2288> or <WG2228> of obedience <WG5218> unto <WG1519> righteousness? <WG1343>

But <WG1161> God be thanked, <WG2316> <WG5485> that <WG3754> ye were <WG2258> the servants <WG1401> of sin, <WG266> but <WG1161> ye have obeyed <WG5219> from <WG1537> the heart <WG2588> that form <WG5179> of doctrine <WG1322> <WG1519> which <WG3739> was delivered <WG3860> you.
Being then <WG1161> made free <WG1659> from <WG575> sin, <WG266> ye became the servants <WG1402> of righteousness. <WG1343>

I speak <WG3004> after the manner of men <WG442> because <WG1223> of the <WG3588> infirmity <WG769> of your <WG5216> flesh: <WG4561> for <WG1063> as <WG5618> ye have yielded <WG3936> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> servants <WG1400> to uncleanness <WG167> and <WG2532> to iniquity <WG458> unto <WG1519> iniquity; <WG458> even so <WG3779> now <WG3568> yield <WG3936> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> servants <WG1400> to righteousness <WG1343> unto <WG1519> holiness. <WG38>
For <WG1063> when <WG3753> ye were <WG2258> the servants <WG1401> of sin, <WG266> ye were <WG2258> free <WG1658> from righteousness. <WG1343>

What <WG5101> fruit <WG2590> <WG3767> had <WG2192> ye then <WG5119> in <WG1909> those things whereof <WG3739> ye are now ashamed? <WG1870> <WG3568> for <WG1063> the <WG3588> end <WG5056> of those things <WG1565> is death. <WG2288>

But <WG1161> now <WG3570> being made free <WG1659> from <WG575> sin, <WG266> and <WG1161> become servants <WG1402> to God, <WG2316> ye have <WG2192> your <WG5216> fruit <WG2590> unto <WG1519> holiness, <WG38> and <WG1161> the <WG3588> end <WG5056> everlasting <WG166> life. <WG2222>

For <WG1063> the <WG3588> wages <WG3800> of sin <WG266> is death; <WG2288> but <WG1161> the <WG3588> gift <WG5486> of God <WG2316> is eternal <WG166> life <WG2222> through <WG1722> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our <WG2257> Lord. <WG2962>
